goal_statement: Transform banking transaction processing to achieve 99.99% availability with sub-second authorization times while reducing operational costs by 25% and supporting 40% transaction volume growth within 12 months.

success_criteria.criteria: Achieve 99.99% system uptime with maximum 52 minutes downtime annually
Authorize 95% of domestic transactions within 150 milliseconds
Reduce transaction processing costs by 25% compared to legacy system
Improve customer satisfaction by 15% in transaction experience ratings
Support 40% transaction volume growth without infrastructure expansion
Maintain zero regulatory compliance violations post-deployment

kpis.kpi: Average response time: <100ms for domestic transactions
Fraud detection accuracy: >99% with <0.1% false positives
Recovery point objective (RPO): 30 seconds maximum data loss

constraints.constraint: Must comply with Federal Reserve, OCC, FDIC, FFIEC banking regulations
Two-phase commit protocols are prohibited due to performance constraints
Maximum transaction completion time must not exceed 5 seconds
Must maintain FIPS 140-2 Level 3 compliance for key management
PCI DSS Level 1 certification required for payment network integration
Planned maintenance windows limited to maximum 4 hours monthly

assumptions.assumption: Existing FIS Profile core banking system will remain operational during integration
Payment network certifications (Visa, Mastercard) can be obtained within project timeline
External data providers (OFAC, credit bureaus) will maintain current service levels
Kubernetes cluster and container registry infrastructure will be available
HSM hardware will be procured and configured before encryption implementation
Current transaction volumes and growth projections are accurate

open_questions.question: What is the rollback strategy if the new system fails to meet performance requirements?
How will transaction data be migrated from legacy system without service interruption?
What is the disaster recovery testing schedule to validate 15-minute RTO?
How will regulatory reporting be validated before go-live?
What is the contingency plan if payment network certifications are delayed?
How will machine learning models be trained and validated for fraud detection?

test_validation.validation_notes: Successfully extracted business-focused goals and outcomes from technical requirements. All success criteria are measurable and time-bound. KPIs have clear target values and measurement timeframes.
